views.createSql: CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS select user.*, nicknames.nickname from user left join nicknames on user.userName = nicknames.username and user.host = nicknames.host

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS select m.groupId, u.id as userId, u.avatarUrl, u.serverId from group_member_v1 as m 
            inner join group_v1 as g
            inner join user as u
            on m.groupId = g.id
                and m.userId = u.serverId
                and g.accountId = u.accountId

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS select m.userListId, u.id as userId, u.avatarUrl, u.serverId from user_list_member as m 
            inner join user_list as ul
            inner join user as u
            on m.userListId = ul.id
                and m.userId = u.serverId
                and ul.accountId = u.accountId

INSERT OR REPLACE INTO room_master_table (id,identity_hash) VALUES(42, '7d3cd25c06bfe956bad9179136b8362a')
